summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges, discounts applied, and payment instructions, indicating a total amount due of $12.73. The invoice also includes information about the shipping address and the nature of the services provided.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
